attributes.action: The UK Government should honour its commitment to Dubs refugeed children
attributes.background:
The decision of the UK Government to quietly scrap its commitment to Dubs in supporting 3,000 unaccompanied refugeed minors is an affront to the international commitments of the UK. 

This is a petition to ensure the UK Government honours this minimal commitment wholly and unconditionally.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
